verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: threw] [ARG1: cold water] [ARG2: on the idea that talks with China are going well] and said that the planned North Korea summit in June may not happen .
President Donald Trump threw cold water on the idea that [V: talks] [ARG2: with China] are going well and said that the planned North Korea summit in June may not happen .
President Donald Trump threw cold water on the idea that talks with China [V: are] going well and said that the planned North Korea summit in June may not happen .
President Donald Trump threw cold water on the idea that [ARG1: talks with China] are [V: going] [ARGM-MNR: well] and said that the planned North Korea summit in June may not happen .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] threw cold water on the idea that talks with China are going well and [V: said] [ARG1: that the planned North Korea summit in June may not happen] .
President Donald Trump threw cold water on the idea that talks with China are going well and said that the [V: planned] [ARG1: North Korea summit] in June may not happen .

President Donald Trump threw cold water on the idea that talks with China are going well and said that [ARG1: the planned North Korea summit in June] [ARGM-MOD: may] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: happen] .
